entry.title: Bro what is up with these UK/French political systems?? Democracy my ass
entry.summary:
Bro what is up with these UK/French political systems?? Democracy my ass
End Wokeness: 9.3 million voted RN ("far-right") today. 5.1 million voted NFP (socialist) today. The people of France wanted a right-wing government to put France first. Instead, they're getting the opposite.
